https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/l3r7K14JVPL1rTYvJm5l2Yp2qhw.jpg Tensions arise when Jack Chan, a spineless constable who regards his work as a job but not a career, is partnered with an energetic and conscientious policewoman, Man Liu. When a serial killer emerges in Hong Kong, Man Liu swears to catch him. Jack is impressed by her bravery and decides to secretly protect her. Crazy n' the City
